result.title: Short report on main outcomes and participating organisations of the workshop on frameworks for characterizing mesoscale organisation of shallow convection
result.description: D2.2 (M12, TU DELFT, CNRS, MPG, ETH, METEO-FRANCE): Short report on main outcomes and participating organisations of the workshop on frameworks for characterizing mesoscale organisation of shallow convection from observations and assessing their role for cloud feedbacks using a hierarchy of models. Participants of this two day workshop will include 12 CONSTRAIN scientists and 3 international participants (for whom costs will be covered by the programme) and up to 15 other participants (who will be expected to cover their own travel, accommodation and subsistence costs) (Task 2.2.2.1).

result.title: Short report on main outcomes and participating organisations of the workshop on aerosol-cloud interactions
result.description: D1.2 (M24, Met Office, ULEI): Short report on main outcomes and participating organisations of the workshop on aerosol-cloud interactions from models vs. observations after volcanic eruptions and other constraints for aerosol-cloud interactions. Participants of this two day workshop will include 7 CONSTRAIN scientists and 2 international participants (for whom costs will be covered by the programme) and up to 9 other participants (who will be expected to cover their own travel, accommodation and subsistence costs) (Tasks 1.1.2 and 1.1.4).

result.title: KGSIR aimed at adaptation planners with info graphics on the robustness of 20-30 year projections
result.description: D5.2 (M36, CNRS, UNIVLEEDS, CLIMATE ANALYTICS, IMPERIAL): KGSIR aimed at adaptation planners characterising how scenario, policy and geophysical uncertainties affect projections over the next 20 to 30 years (Task 5.1.2).
